sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-checkbox
    :value="isChecked"
    @change="updateChecked"
    :label="label"
  ></v-checkbox>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'AlldayCheck',
  props: ['label'],
  computed: {
    isChecked: {
      get() {
        return this.$store.state.allDayChecked
      },
      set(checked) {
        this.$store.commit('setAllDayChecked', checked)
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    updateChecked() {
      this.isChecked = !this.isChecked
    }
  }
};
</script>
